CustomField.description: Semicolon delineated list of attribute names on the Product level to be shown in the Product Summary view in CPQ. The following CPQ attributes are valid: 'Start_Date', 'End_Date', 'Quantity', 'Discount', 'Unit_Price', 'List_Price', 'Sub_Total_Price', and 'Total_Price'. Any QuoteLineItem Field API names are also supported in the event that they are displayed in CPQ.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: List of attribute names on the Product level to be shown in the Product Summary view in CPQ. The following CPQ attributes are valid: 'Start_Date', 'End_Date', 'Quantity', 'Discount', 'Unit_Price', 'List_Price', 'Sub_Total_Price', and 'Total_Price'. Any QuoteLineItem Field API names are also supported in the event that they are displayed in CPQ.
CustomField.label: Adjustable Product Columns
